title: The Proposition
description: Alice has accepted a job working for Hollywood actor Oliver Park and is only just beginning to understand everything his proposition entails.She really wants to become a screenwriter but doesn't know if she can give him her body and heart without there being any consequences.Just when she thinks she is making a breakthrough, he does the unimaginable and she is left more confused than ever. She has an idea to get the better of him but will it work?
author: Helen    Cooper
